file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 55-36-03-06 - TAIL NAVIGATION LIGHTS SUPPORT/VIBRATION ISOLATION MOUNTS - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TAIL NAVIGATION LIGHTS SUPPORT/VIBRATION ISOLATION MOUNTS - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to do a general visual inspection of the rubber vibration isolation mounts of the tail navigation lights support. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY RUBBER VIBRATION ISOLATION ALL 55-36-03-200-801-A MOUNTS - VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 55-36-03 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 55-36-03-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. RUBBER VIBRATION ISOLATION MOUNTS - VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) A General Visual Inspection (GVI) is a visual check of the component for damage, failure, or irregular conditions. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 55-36-01-000-801-A/400 TAIL-BOOM LIGHT LENS - REMOVAL AMM TASK 55-36-01-400-801-A/400 TAIL-BOOM LIGHT LENS - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 55-36-03-000-801-A/400 TAIL NAVIGATION LIGHTS SUPPORT - REMOVAL TAIL NAVIGATION LIGHTS SUPPORT - INSTALLA- AMM TASK 55-36-03-400-801-A/400 TION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 337 Tail boom D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Tail boom I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the tail boom lens ( AMM TASK 55-36-01-000-801-A/400). (2) Remove the tail navigation lights support ( AMM TASK 55-36-03-000-801-A/400). J. Vibration Isolation Mounts - Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the three vibration isolation mounts and look for: EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 55-36-03 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (a) Separation between the rubber and the stud plate and cracks in the rubber. To do this, bend the mounts in all directions, as shown in Figure 601. (b) Nicks in the rubber. Nicks exist when the surface of the rubber has been sliced or worn away. NOTE: If any of the damages is present, replace the vibration isolation mount. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the tail navigation lights support ( AMM TASK 55-36-03-400-801-A/400). (2) Install the tail boom lens ( AMM TASK 55-36-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 55-36-03 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Vibration Isolation Mounts - Visual Inspection Figure 601 A VIBRATION ISOLATION MOUNT EXAMINE THESE EXAMINE THE RUBBER REGIONS FOR FOR THE PRESENCE OF DISBONDING CRACKS VIEW A VIEW A EXAMINE THE RUBBER FOR THE PRESENCE OF NICKS 145AMM550074.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 55-36-03 Page 4 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A.
